summary: Build a simple website with a custom/public URL that can be submitted to Google Search, featuring a high-quality in-app video recorder (camera button opens device camera for recording) and an in-app audio recorder (mic icon opens recorder to save recordings as MP3), and the site should include the user's logo.
architectural_notes: UI requirement: camera button opens device camera to record video.
UI requirement: mic icon (at the bottom/last) opens audio recorder and allows saving as MP3.
Site should be Google indexable (submit URL to Google Search / Search Console).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern music/recording brand logo with a clean mic + camera motif, warm amber/orange accent on dark background (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Square favicon version of the same logo, simplified for small sizes (favicon.dim_32x32.png)

existing_features.title: Add a prominent Camera option in the UI that, when clicked, requests camera permission and opens an in-app video recorder using the device camera.
Add multiple video recording options in the in-app video recorder (at minimum: front/back camera switch when available, resolution quality selector, and optional audio on/off toggle).
Add a mic-type logo/icon at the end of the main page UI that, when clicked, opens an in-app audio recorder that records from the microphone and lets the user operate it (start/pause/stop).
Enable saving audio recordings as an MP3 file from the in-app audio recorder, with a download action after recording completes.
Replace the current letter-based header mark with the userâ€™s logo image and ensure it appears in the header on all main screens.
Make the site indexing-ready by adding basic SEO metadata to the HTML head (title, meta description, and Open Graph tags) using English text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple website with a public/custom URL that can be submitted to Google Search (indexing-ready).
Add an in-app video recorder: a camera button that opens the phone camera to record video, with multiple recording options.
Add an in-app audio recorder: a mic icon that opens an audio recorder and saves recordings as MP3.
Include the user's logo on the website page.

projectName: Add in-app camera video recorder and mic audio recorder (MP3) with logo and indexing-ready metadata
